item.title: 显示HN：从一个应用程序跟踪您的财务资产和负债
item.description:
从大学毕业后，我很快意识到我的钱在许多不同的地方最终出现。 I was frustrated having to log in to different bank accounts, retirement accounts, and investment accounts, and tally everything up at the end of the month in a spreadsheet.So I created VuFi, which does it for me, automatically, every day!I've been building the app myself over the last few years, and it's finally gotten to the point where I believe it can be useful for other people as well.I would love any feedback on the idea, UI, or features that我应该在不久的将来加！
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444064998 点：1 ＃评论：0
